sentences.sentence: They have signally failed to keep their election promises.
sentences.translation: 他们显然没有履行自己的竞选承诺。

sentences.sentence: They have signally reduced the number of land-border disputes with their fourteen neighbors.
sentences.translation: 他们减少了与十四个邻国的边界争端，这是个非凡的成就。

sentences.sentence: Historians have long debated why the Chinese so signally failed to exploit their early promise.
sentences.translation: 历史学家长期在争论，为什么中国人没能利用早期的成就。
